code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../App.css';import ConfirmModal from'./confirmModal';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FormWindow(_ref){let{display,setDisplay}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[content,setContent]=useState('');const[showModal,setShowModal]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();console.log(title,content);setTitle('');setContent('');setShowModal(true);};if(!display){return null;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"formWindow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"exit",onClick:()=>setDisplay(false)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"form",style:{height:'60%'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"formHeader",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Send a mail to cantact withe me"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"emailFormBody",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"formGroup",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"title",children:"Title:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{style:{width:'80%'},type:"text",id:"title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"formGroup",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"content",children:"Content:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{style:{width:'80%'},id:"content",value:content,onChange:e=>setContent(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',height:'100%',alignItems:'center'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"submitBtn",onClick:handleSubmit,children:"Submit"})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ConfirmModal,{show:showModal,onClose:setShowModal,message:'Email was sent successfully.'})]});}export default FormWindow;
